data.title: Week In Review: Stan Rosenberg Resigns, Scott Lively And The Mass. GOP
data.meta_description: Our panelists break down the latest news from the State House and last weekend's state Republican convention.
data.text:
Former state Senate President Stan Rosenberg's tenure in the Senate is over. Rosenberg will resign following intense pressure stemming from the findings of a Senate Ethics Committee report that revealed he should have done more protect people in State House from the actions of his husband, Bryon Hefner.

Plus, we discuss what Scott Lively's candidacy means for Republicans.

Guests

Joe Battenfeld, political columnist at the Boston Herald and host of "Battenfeld" on Boston Herald Radio. He tweets @joebattenfeld.
